message:
Hi Abhishek,

I hope you're doing well! It's been a while since we last connected, and I thought it would be great to catch up. I was reminiscing about our time at The University of Texas at Austin and the exciting projects we came across there. Your journey from a Research Assistant at VJTI to your impressive role as a Senior Applied Scientist at Amazon is truly inspiring.

It would be fantastic to hear more about the work you're doing at Amazon now, especially your experience transitioning from a Software Development Engineer to an Applied Scientist. I'm sure there's a lot of innovation happening, and I'd love to learn from your insights. Perhaps we can discuss some of the latest trends in applied science and technology?

Looking forward to reconnecting!

Best regards,

Andre
